Name: Book Seeker
About the game: About this game: This is a plot decryption game with a total flow of about an hour. It contains certain horror elements, chasing battles and decrypting content. The game does not support mouse operation, please use the keyboard completely. Story introduction: You will play a commissioned detective in the game. Your client wants you to help find the treasures of his grandfather: a very special book, The client’s book was stolen from the window one night. When you delve into this matter, you find that there are some secrets in it. Even related to an unspeakable race...
